Posts.Content: Sep 5, 2015 08:23PM Becki1218 wrote: I am using a home made deodorant that works and should be safe. 6 tbsp coconut oil 1\4 cup each corn starch & baking soda. Mix well and store in an air tight container. I keep mine in the fridge in the summer. Also, I use a makeup sponge to apply. You will smell like suntan lotion. I have a tiny little container that I keep in my purse so I can apply after treatment if I'm not going right home.
Posts.Title: Deodorant Nancdancer SOuwant2fite
